H0.text: Libya was a colony of which European country prior to World War II. France

H1.text: Libya was a colony of which European country prior to World War II. United Kingdom

H2.text: Libya was a colony of which European country prior to World War II. Germany

H3.text: Libya was a colony of which European country prior to World War II. ItalY

A4.text: Libya was a colony of Italy located in North Africa, between 1934 and 1943.

A5.text: Italian efforts to colonise Libya began in 1911, and were characterised initially by major struggles with Muslim native Libyans that lasted until 1931.
